headline: Fortive: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.12 per share. The industrial conglomerate posted revenue of $1.62 billion in the period, which did not meet Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.63 billion.

raw.headline: Fortive: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.12 per share. The industrial conglomerate posted revenue of $1.62 billion in the period, which did not meet Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.63 billion.

headline: Fortive (NYSE:FTV) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q4 Earnings
summary: Industrial technology company Fortive (NYSE:FTV) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024 as sales rose 2.3% year on year to $1.62 billion. Next quarter’s revenue guidance of $1.50 billion underwhelmed, coming in 3.7% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.17 per share was 4.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
